name: Geiger Counter
description: # Geiger CounterThis script allows the GM to dynamically create radioactive areas in theirmaps. Characters that have Geiger counters will be alerted how many radsthey are taking.## To create a radioactive source object:1) Create a token representing the source on the GM layer.2) Set that token's 'radioactive' status marker to on.3) Set its aura1 radius to the distance at which characters will starttaking rads from it.4) Set the bar1 value to amount of rads/s characters will take at the edgeof its aura.5) Set the bar1 max value to the maximum amount of rads/s characters can takefrom it.## To give a player a Geiger counter:1) Give them a 'hasGeigerCounter' attribute.2) Set the attribute to 'true'.If a character moves in a radioactive area and they have a Geiger counter,their Geiger counter will alert everyone how many rads/s they are taking.If a character moves in a radioactive area and they don't have a Geigercounter, only the GM will be alerted how many rads/s they are taking.
